participant_1.background:
On the weekend, I enjoy relaxing in my recliner after a long week of work.
i hope one day to own a stable of at least 10 race horses.
i love to run fast.
I'm a great storyteller, and I use that to make friends and get to know my family.
My clumsy ways will be met with criticism from others, but my dog will always be there for me.

participant_2.background:
I don't care what my father thinks, I like what I like.
I was able to make a delicious pie for my family even though my credit cards were maxed out.
I collect interesting stories from my neighborhood.
I want to stay close to my mom and my grandchildren.
i love to larp.

content.text: I am a great storyteller. I use that to make friends and get to know my family.
I collect interesting stories from my neighborhood.
That's a neat hobby. I like to learn about people.
I also like to larp. What are your interests?
I love to run fast. I hope one day to own a stable of at least 10 race horses.
That's a lot of horses! I'm more of a dog person myself.
I love dogs too! My dog is always there for me. He doesn't care if I'm clumsy.
That's sweet. My mom and my grandchildren are always there for me too.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to cook. I made a delicious pie for my family even though my credit cards were maxed out.
That's impressive! I'm not much of a cook, but I like to relax in my recliner on the weekends.
I don't care what my father thinks, I like what I like.
That's the spirit! I like to stay close to my mom and my grandchildren.
That's great. I'm glad you have a close family
